name: pdfgenstudio
title: PDF Gen Studio
description: Official PDF Gen Studio MCP Server - Generate PDFs and images from templates, JSON, HTML, or URLs for Cursor, Claude and any LLM clients

PDFGENSTUDIO_API_KEY.description: Your PDF Gen Studio API key. Get one at https://pdfgenstudio.com

PDFGENSTUDIO_BASE_URL.description: API base URL (optional, for self-hosted instances)

tools.name: render_template
tools.description: Render a saved template to PDF or image with optional dynamic data injection

tools.name: render_template_image
tools.description: Render a template to an image and return it as viewable image content

tools.name: render_json
tools.description: Convert a JSON design document to PDF or image

tools.name: render_json_image
tools.description: Render a JSON document to an image and return it as viewable image content

tools.name: render_html
tools.description: Convert HTML/CSS content to PDF or image

tools.name: render_html_image
tools.description: Render HTML content to an image and return it as viewable image content

tools.name: render_url
tools.description: Screenshot any website URL and convert to PDF or image

tools.name: render_url_image
tools.description: Screenshot a webpage and return it as viewable image content

tools.name: list_templates
tools.description: List all saved templates in your PDF Gen Studio account

tools.name: get_template
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific template

tools.name: get_template_schema
tools.description: Get the modifiable elements/schema of a template
